sn20.2:1.2: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṃ nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsuṃ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn20.2:1.4: katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ, yo cāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito yā cāyaṃ mahāpathavī”ti?
sn20.2:1.6: Appamattakoyaṃ bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito.
sn20.2:1.7: Saṅkhampi na upeti upanidhimpi na upeti kalabhāgampi na upeti mahāpathaviṃ upanidhāya bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito”ti.
sn20.2:1.8: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussesu paccājāyanti;
sn20.2:1.9: atha kho eteyeva bahutarā sattā ye aññatra manussehi paccājāyanti.
